overview: The Secrets We Kept is a love story thatâ€™s based on a real life CIA plot to bring the story of Doctor Zhivago into Russia, which the Russian government had banned for being subversive. In this thrilling and romantic tale, secretaries become CIA agents involved in international espionage while an affair between an author and his lover add to the intrigue as well.  Based on the book by Lara Prescott.
title: The Secrets We Kept
